Quizlet:
*Hello*
noun: hello, hallo
Hallo, goedendag! - Hello, good day!

*nice*
adjective: nice, entertaining, amusing
adverb: prettily
Het is leuk om hier te zijn. - It is nice to be here.

*Sorry*
interjection: Sorry!, I am sorry!
Sorry, ik heb je verkeerd begrepen. - Sorry, I misunderstood you.

*all*
adjective: all
Alle mensen zijn gelijk. - All people are equal.

*each other*
adverb: each other, one another
pronoun: each other, one another
We zien elkaar morgen. - We'll see each other tomorrow.

*please*
preposition: to
adverb: towards
adjective: shut, closed
Ik voeg het toe. - I add it.

*knew*
verb: know, wit, wot
Ik wist dat het zo zou zijn. - I knew it would be this way.

*say*
verb: say, tell, put
Zij zegt dat het te laat is. She says it's too late.

*mean*
verb: mean, intend, design
Ik bedoel dat ik het niet weet. - I mean that I don't know.

*stay*
verb: remain, stay, keep
Blijf bij me, stay with me.

*please*
interjection: Please!
"Kan ik alsjeblieft een glas water hebben?" - "Can I please have a glass of water?"

*long*
adjective: long, tall, prolonged
adverb: long
Het duurde lang voordat hij aankwam - It took a long time before he arrived.

*sir*
abbreviation: Mr.
noun: mister, monsieur, gent
Meneer, mag ik u iets vragen? - Mister, may I ask you something?

*sees*
verb: see, view, look
"Hij ziet er goed uit." - He looks good.

*makes*
verb: make, do, build
Hij maakt een goede indruk. - He makes a good impression.

*listen*
noun: splendor, magnificence, pomp
Luister naar mij! - Listen to me!

*stuff*
verb: bargain, sue, chaffer
Ik doe dingen die ik leuk vind. = I do things that I like.

*Nice*
adjective: beautiful, nice, pretty
adverb: beautifully, fine, prettily
Het is een mooie dag. - It is a beautiful day.

*became*
verb: be, become, get
Hij werd gekozen als president. - He was elected as president.

*first*
adjective: first, initial, former
noun: first
adverb: initially
Mijn eerste taal was Engels. - My first language was English.

*Please*
adverb: gladly, willingly, fain
Ik zou het graag weten. - I'd like to know.

*Naturally*
adverb: of course, naturally, no doubt
adjective: natural, native, unsophisticated
Natuurlijk wil ik dat doen. - Of course I want to do that.

*to hold*
verb: keep, hold, retain
Ik houd van jou. - I love you.

*without*
preposition: without, sans, out of
adverb: no
Ik kan niet zonder jou leven. - I can't live without you.

*still*
adverb: always, ever
adjective: town
Steeds meer mensen kopen hun boodschappen online. - More and more people are buying their groceries online.

*to get*
verb: get, receive, have
Ik krijg een cadeau. - I am getting a present.

*great*
adjective: large, great, big
Mijn grote broer woont in een andere stad. - My big brother lives in another city.

*behind*
adverb: behind, after, post
preposition: behind, after
adjective: hind, slow
noun: venerator
Ik sta achter mijn beslissing. - I stand behind my decision.

*absolutely*
adverb: all, completely, quite
Hij is helemaal klaar. - He is completely ready.

*name*
noun: name, first name, title
Mijn naam is Paul, My name is Paul.

*crazy*
adjective: crazy, mad, fool
noun: fool, madman, nut
adverb: foolishly, queerly
phrase: off one's head, off one's nuts
"Hij is echt gek!" - He is really crazy!

*to stay*
verb: remain, stay, keep
Ik blijf hier wonen. - I will stay here living.

*below*
adverb: under, below, underneath
preposition: under, among, amongst
adjective: lower, vice, deputy
conjunction: whilst

*friend*
noun: friend, pal, well-wisher
Mijn vriend is mijn beste vriend. - My friend is my best friend.

*been*

Ik ben al eerder in Nederland geweest. - I have been to the Netherlands before.

*to look*
verb: look, see, glance
Ik kijk naar de tv. - I'm looking at the TV.

*to give*
verb: give, deliver, impart
Ik geef je een knuffel - I give you a hug.

*went*
verb: go, proceed, work

*narrate*
verb: tell, relate, narrate

*ever *
adverb: ever, sometime, whilom
Ooit heb ik in het buitenland gewoond. - I have lived abroad at some point.

*fast*
adverb: quickly, fast, rapidly
adjective: quick, fast, rapid

*hand*
noun: hand, mitt, dukes

*idea*
noun: idea, notion, thought
Het idee is om het te doen. The idea is to do it.

*good  *
noun: well

*car*
adjective: auto
noun: car, automobile, motor

*came*
verb: come, get, come to
Ik kwam te laat. - I came too late.

*damn*
interjection: Blast it!
Verdomme, ik heb mijn sleutels vergeten! Damn, I forgot my keys!

*bit*
noun: bit, little, tad
adjective: little

verb: must

*children*
noun: children, kids, olive-branches

*when*
adverb: when
conjunction: when, if, as

verb: happen, be, occur

*boy*
noun: boy, lad, pup
verb: breed, kitten, whelp

*anxious*
adjective: afraid, scared, fearful
adverb: anxiously
Ik ben bang dat het te laat is. - I'm afraid it's too late.

*ask*
noun: question, demand, request
"Heeft u een vraag?" - Do you have a question?

*seems*
verb: seem, appear, look

*awesome*
adjective: immense, violent, colossal
adverb: mightily, vastly, colossally

*couple*
noun: couple, pair, couplet

*hear*
verb: hear, belong, learn

*last*
noun: last

Translation: The last day of the vacation was the most relaxed.

*did*
verb: do, make, perform

*new ones*
adjective: new, novel, fresh

*to ask*
verb: ask, question, request
noun: enquiry

*can*

"Kun je me helpen?" - Can you help me?

*saw*
verb: see, view, look
Ik zag hem lopen. - I saw him walking.

*to assure*
verb: care, worry, look
Ik zorg ervoor dat de klusjes gedaan worden. - I make sure that the chores are done.

*to stand*
verb: stand, be, face
De leraren staan voor de klas. - The teachers are standing in front of the class.

*world*
noun: world, universe
De wereld is een grote plaats. - The world is a big place.

*to eat*
verb: food, eat, meal
noun: grub, peck

*guys*
adjective: boyish
"Jongens, laten we gaan!" - Boys, let's go!

*any*
adjective: some
pronoun: some
adverb: a few

The only way to get out of this is by working together.

*yourself*
pronoun: itself, self, myself

*because*
conjunction: because, for, as
noun: mitten, shrouds
Ik wil dat je me helpt, I want you to help me.

*to take*
verb: take, reach, seize
Ik neem de bus naar school. - I take the bus to school.

*to*
adverb: away

*Sun*
noun: sun, daystar
Zo'n grote stad is echt indrukwekkend. - Such a big city is really impressive.

*Best*

*know*
verb: know
Ik ken haar al jaren. - I have known her for years.

*Today*
adverb: today

*even*
adverb: even

*ie*

*said*
verb: say, tell, put

*had*
verb: have, possess, own

If they had had the chance, they would have done it.

*tell*
verb: tell, relate, narrate

*first*
adjective: first, primary, one

: first

First I painted the cake.

*found it*
verb: find, think of, hit upon

*son*

*outside*

*together*
adverb: together

*think*
verb: think, think of, conceive

*believe*
noun: faith, belief, religion

*tomorrow*
adverb: tomorrow, next day

*past*
adverb: ago, since

*girl*
noun: girl, maid, maiden

*At home*
adverb: home, in, indoors

*thinks*
verb: think, think of, conceive

*Calm*
adjective: quiet, tranquil, calm

*men*
